titles.title: Limiting Investor and Homeowner Loss in Foreclosure Act of 2014
To limit investor and homeowner losses in foreclosures, and for other purposes.
Limiting Investor and Homeowner Loss in Foreclosure Act of 2014

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Regulatory Reform, Commercial And Antitrust Law.

committee.subcommittee: Regulatory Reform, Commercial And Antitrust Law
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: Limiting Investor and Homeowner Loss in Foreclosure Act of 2014 - Authorizes a bankruptcy court to establish a loss mitigation program for the negotiation of consensual alternatives to avoid foreclosure between an individual debtor and the holder of a claim secured by a security interest in the debtor's principal residence.
